page.title: 06 THE NATIONAL TRUST
page.content: The National Trust is an important landowner in this area.They own a large proportion of the farmland which they lease to tenants.They also own most of the natural woodland in the area. The farms owned by the Trust are: Woodhuish Farm which has 604 acres most of which is in our "D"Block. Coleton Barton Farm,part of Coleton Fishacre Estate,which has about half of its 305 acres in our area. There are aproximately 60 acres of National Trust woodland around Kingswear. Mr. Alan Pope,the National Trust's Heritage Coast Warden is responsible for maintaining the coastal path to Brixham. { Sophie Hall,Nicola Rundle
